00019 QRgb VolumeRenderer::transfer(float value)
00020 {
00021     value = value < 0.f ? 0.f : value;
00022     value = value > 1.f ? 1.f : value;
00023 
00024     int index = value * (transferLUT.width() - 1);
00025 
00026     return transferLUT.pixel(index, 0);
00027 }

00029 void VolumeRenderer::updateTransfer()
00030 {
00031     QGradient g = QLinearGradient(QPoint(0, 0), QPoint(transferLUT.width(),0));
00032 
00033     for (int i=0; i<m_stops.size(); ++i)
00034         g.setColorAt(m_stops.at(i).first, m_stops.at(i).second);
00035 
00036     g.setSpread(QGradient::PadSpread);
00037 
00038     QPainter *p = new QPainter(&transferLUT);
00039 
00040     p->setBrush(g);
00041     p->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00042 
00043     p->drawRect(rect());
00044 
00045     delete p;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void VolumeRenderer::setGradientStops(const QGradientStops &stops)
00049 {
00050     m_stops = stops;
00051 
00052     updateTransfer();
00053 
00054     update();
00055 }

00057 void VolumeRenderer::paint(QPainter *p)
00058 {
00059     //TODO replace code with raycasting
00060 
00061     image->fill(Qt::black);
00062 
00063     // Draw to QImage
00064     for (int i = 0; i < 100; ++i)

00066         image->setPixel(i, i, qRgb(i, i, i));
00067     }
00068 
00069     // Draw Qimage to QPaintDevice
00070     p->drawImage(0, 0, *image);
